def contains_assert(self, value, response, status_code): """ 字符串包含断言模式，断言预期结果的字符串是否包含在接口的响应信息中 :param value: 预期结果，yaml文件的预期结果值 :param response: 接口实际响应结果 :param status_code: 响应状态码 :return: 返回结果的状态标识 """ # 断言状态标识，0成功，其他失败 flag = 0 for assert_key, assert_value in value.items(): if assert_key == "status_code": if assert_value != status_code: flag += 1 allure.attach(f"预期结果：{assert_value}\n实际结果：{status_code}", '响应代码断言结果:失败', attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT) logs.error("contains断言失败：接口返回码【%s】不等于【%s】" % (status_code, assert_value)) else: > resp_list = jsonpath.jsonpath(response, "$..%s" % assert_key) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ E AttributeError: module 'jsonpath' has no attribute 'jsonpath'.
